## SubscriptionController.subscribe() method

Subscribes to the set of tracked references and objects. Once subscribed, the [SubscriptionController.effect](./reactive.subscriptioncontroller.effect.md) will be triggered whenever any of the values change.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
subscribe(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

void
